mapper.select:
WITH TEMP --递归 AS (SELECT Id,level,Name,parent_id,comment FROM ll_address WHERE Id = #{addressId} --查询当前地址 UNION ALL SELECT B.Id, --查询子集地址 B.level,B.Name,B.parent_id,B.comment FROM TEMP A INNER JOIN ll_address B ON B.parent_id = A.Id)
select *, (select P_Name from Price where P_Id =U_PriceId ) as priceName , (select name from ll_address a where a.id = addressId ) addressName, (select dk_name from deviceinfo di, devicekind dk where dk.dk_id = di.di_dkid and di.di_userid = u_id ) deviceKindName from userInfo
and u_id = #{u_id} and u_phone like '%' + #{u_phone} + '%' and u_status = #{u_status} and u_cardno = #{u_cardno} and u_no = #{u_no} and u_name like '%' + #{u_name} + '%' and u_paperwork like '%' + #{u_paperwork} + '%' and u_buildingid = #{u_buildingid} and u_operatorid in ( select o1.o_id from operator o1 ,operator o2 where o2.O_Id= #{u_operatorid} and o1.O_CompanyId = o2.O_CompanyId ) and u_buildingid in ( select b_id from Building where b_areaid = #{areaid} ) and exists ( select 1 from TEMP t where addressId = t.id )
${orderby}
